items.name: Binance API Library
items.short_description: NodeJs library integrating Binance's exchange API
long_description: Node.js library offering fully-functional direct integration with Binance's exchange API.
Binance is the leading cryptocurrency exchange.

items.name: EMP (Employee Management Platform)
long_description: RESTful CRUD application designed
to be custom tailored to small businesses in need of workforce and/or payroll
management streamlining. Features include employee management, job/task creation,
employee scheduling, messaging and payroll management.

items.name: Wavez
long_description: RESTful CRUD application revolving around crowd-sourced beach info,
Users can create accounts in order to add new
beaches or leave comments on beaches currently on record. A demo account
can be accessed through admin1:admin1

items.name: Tetra
long_description: Cryptocurrency portfolio manager. Users create an account,
and then add their asset or assets they would like to track to their dashboard.
Balances for each asset can be added, and a total portfolio balance is calculated.
A demo account can be accessed under demo@demo.com:demodemo.

items.name: netBot
long_description: Automated cryptocurrency trading script. Through continuous
statisctial analysis of price action, Netbot watches every single
trade for specific conditions. Should those conditions occur, a buy order is
placed at a specific rate and left for a period of time. If the order fills,
a sell order is then placed at a specific rate, while the script watches for
a potential stop-loss condition.
